VARIABLES.NAME: ai_emotion
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The current emotion of the AI, can be 'NEUTRAL', 'HAPPINESS', 'AFFECTION', 'SADNESS' or 'ANGER'

VARIABLES.NAME: ai_emotion_probability
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The probability calculation of the current emotion

VARIABLES.NAME: current_language
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The current language that the AI predicts the conversation is based in

VARIABLES.NAME: current_language_probability
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The probability calculation of the language detection
